definition: see 大禹[Da4 Yu3]
summer
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
Yu the Great (c. 21st century BC), mythical leader who tamed the floods/surname Yu

sentences.english: Yu of the Xia Dynasty exploited the road towards civilization in the Huanghe River Basin.
sentences.chinese: 夏禹的功業，據說開闢了黃河流域邁向文明的道路。
